original_title: Luxure, Les plaisirs de ma femme
overview: Since they met, Whitney and Ricky have found they have a lot in common. They quickly discovered that for their relationship to work, they needed to vary the pleasures and spice up their sex life as much as possible.  Mariska and James are also fans of shared pleasures. They have prepared a very exciting scene to welcome Kristof, their guest of the day.  To find new playmates, Ricky and Whitney have two options. They can choose them on specialized websites, or, like tonight, they can go to the most popular clubs of the city to meet them and select them directly.  Tonight, Candie's husband has planned to invite some friends and to introduce them to her. The pretty brunette is getting used to these "surprise" visits and is beginning to enjoy them.  Today, Chloe and Alex want to change their habits. Their sex life is fine but "for the fun of it", they decided to open their door to a stranger to try a three-way experience.
title: Luxure: My Wife's Pleasures
